Home.heroTitle: Discover the hidden gem of Trutnov
Home.subtext: Our prime and affordable location near the historical center of Trutnov ensures convenience and easy access to all the attractions the city has to offer.

Surroundings.title: Surroundings
Surroundings.trutnovDescription: Trutnov, surrounded by the Krkono≈°e Mountains, is a city filled with history and nature. Discover its historic sites, enjoy local festivals, and use it as a base for outdoor adventures. Easy transportation options make exploring the surrounding area a breeze.
Surroundings.krkonoseDescription: Krkono≈°e Mountains National Park, located near Trutnov, is a natural wonderland. Explore its pristine landscapes, hike through lush forests, and marvel at its unique wildlife. With Trutnov as your starting point, access to this national park is easy, offering endless opportunities for outdoor enthusiasts.
Surroundings.adrspachDescription: These unique sandstone rock formations are located just a short drive from Trutnov. They offer a fantastic hiking experience with dramatic landscapes. Include information on the best hiking routes and entrance fees.
Surroundings.kuksDescription: Kuks is famous for its historic Baroque hospital founded by Count Franti≈°ek Anton√≠n ≈†pork. Explain the hospital's history, its stunning sculptures by Maty√°≈° Braun, and any guided tours available.
Surroundings.zooDescription: ZOO Dv≈Ør Kr√°lov√© is a renowned zoological garden located near Trutnov, Czech Republic. It is one of the largest and most respected zoos in Europe, known for its conservation efforts and breeding programs for endangered species. Visitors can explore diverse habitats and see a wide range of animals, including elephants, rhinoceroses, giraffes, and big cats. The zoo's mission is to promote wildlife conservation and educate visitors about the importance of protecting endangered species.
Surroundings.dolceDescription: Dolce Pond is a peaceful and scenic spot near Trutnov, Czech Republic. It's a great place for nature lovers to enjoy activities like fishing, boating, and picnicking. Surrounded by beautiful forests, it's the perfect location to relax and connect with nature.. Is this how you imagined it? I can simplify the text so it can be more human
